name: tomaka
bio: Pierre Krieger has been in the Rust ecosystem since 2014. After leading several popular open source repositories such as glutin, glium, vulkano, or redshirt, he joined Parity Technologies in 2017 where he led the networking team of Substrate (the framework Polkadot uses). He left Parity at the end of 2022 in order to focus on its work on a Substrate/Polkadot light client as a freelance.
